questions.questionText: Which of these are types of business letters? (Choose all that apply)
What are the common parts of a formal business letter? (Choose all that apply)
What kind of language should you use in a business letter?
What is one major difference between a business and a personal letter?
options: Business letters use formal language and structure
Personal letters are sent to companies
questions.correctAnswer: Business letters use formal language and structure

questions.questionText: What is the main purpose of a CV?
options: To list your skills and experience for a job
To apply for a driving license
questions.correctAnswer: To list your skills and experience for a job

questions.questionText: Which of these are typical sections in a CV? (Choose all that apply)
What is the main function of a cover letter?
options: To introduce yourself and explain why you are applying
questions.correctAnswer: To introduce yourself and explain why you are applying
